communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Freedom of Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

Court records show allege that a FEMA employee was asked to participate in a false report regarding LIDAR applications for DR-4339-PR (Hurricane María): https://www.courtlistener.com/docket/68106635/6/maneiro-v-mayorkas/

Therefore, I request the following records:

1) Any records regarding the use of light detection and ranging (LIDAR) for DR-4339-PR. 

2) Communications, emails, text messages, and attachments regarding the use or possible applications for LIDAR for DR-4339-PR. 

3)  Any presentations, presentation attachments, and instructional materials (these include but are not limited to audio, video, PowerPoint presentations, and slide formats) concerning use or possible applications for LIDAR for DR-4339-PR. 

Keywords: "DR-4339-PR" "LIDAR" "Hurricane Irma" "Hurricane María" "Puerto Rico" "LIDAR applications"

This request is for all records produced between January 1, 2017 and the time this request is processed.

This request is not being made for commercial purposes. I am an independent journalist and documents obtained by this request will be used in the course of reporting on the aftermath of Hurricane Maria.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 20 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Carlos Berríos Polanco

title: OIG FEMA AUDIT 18-044-AUD-FEMA (Department of Homeland Security Office of Inspector General)

communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Freedom of Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

Court records show that FEMA employees disclosed information that went into an OIG Audit 18-044-AUD-FEMA, concerning PW 251: https://www.courtlistener.com/docket/68106635/6/maneiro-v-mayorkas/

1) A copy of the Inspector General OIG Audit 18-044-AUD-FEMA.

2) Any communications, emails, or text messages concerning information about PW 251 that went into the aforementioned audit 18-044-AUD-FEMA. 

Keywords: "18-044-AUD-FEMA" "PW 251" and "Puerto Rico"

Please include all records between January 1, 2018 and the time this request is processed.

This request is not being done for commercial purposes. I am a freelance journalist reporting on the aftermath of Hurricane Maria.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 20 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Carlos Berríos Polanco
